    • deleteUserById

      @PreAuthorize("hasRole(\'ROLE_BASE_USER\') or hasRole(\'ROLE_HOST_USER\') or hasRole(\'ROLE_ADMIN_USER\')") @DeleteMapping("{userId}") public void deleteUserById(@PathVariable("userId") String userId)

    • udpateUser

      @PreAuthorize("hasRole(\'ROLE_BASE_USER\') or hasRole(\'ROLE_HOST_USER\') or hasRole(\'ROLE_ADMIN_USER\')") @PutMapping("{userId}") public UserModel udpateUser(@PathVariable(name="userId") String userId, @RequestBody UserModel userModelToUpdate)

    • getAllStartedUsers

      @PreAuthorize("hasRole(\'ROLE_ADMIN_USER\')") @GetMapping("all/started") public List<UserModel> getAllStartedUsers()

    • getAllUsers

      @PreAuthorize("hasRole(\'ROLE_ADMIN_USER\')") @GetMapping("all") public List<UserModel> getAllUsers()

    • getUserById

      @GetMapping("{userId}") public UserModel getUserById(@PathVariable("userId") String userId)

    • getUserByEmail

      @PreAuthorize("hasRole(\'ROLE_BASE_USER\') or hasRole(\'ROLE_HOST_USER\') or hasRole(\'ROLE_ADMIN_USER\')") @GetMapping("load/{userEmail}") public org.springframework.security.core.userdetails.UserDetails getUserByEmail(@PathVariable(name="userEmail") String emailToSearch)

    • checkUserExistsByEmail

      @GetMapping("exists") public boolean checkUserExistsByEmail(@RequestParam(name="email") String emailToSearch)

    • getUserIdByEmail

      @GetMapping("load") public Integer getUserIdByEmail(@RequestParam(name="email") String emailToSearch)
